[docs]def color(text, color_code):
    """Colorize text.
    
    :param text: text.
    :param color_code: color.
    :return: colorized text.
    """
    # $TERM under Windows:
    # cmd.exe -> "" (what would you expect..?)
    # cygwin -> "cygwin" (should support colors, but doesn't work somehow)
    # mintty -> "xterm" (supports colors)
    if sys.platform == "win32" and os.getenv("TERM") != "xterm":
        return text
    return "\x1b[%dm%s\x1b[0m" % (color_code, text)



[docs]def black(text):
    return color(text, 30)



[docs]def red(text):
    return color(text, 31)



[docs]def green(text):
    return color(text, 32)



[docs]def yellow(text):
    return color(text, 33)



[docs]def blue(text):
    return color(text, 34)



[docs]def magenta(text):
    return color(text, 35)



[docs]def cyan(text):
    return color(text, 36)



[docs]def white(text):
    return color(text, 37)



[docs]def bold(text):
    return color(text, 1)
